author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FERNAND LIKELY TO BECOME A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE TOMORROW...
summary: ...FERNAND LIKELY TO BECOME A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE TOMORROW... As of 11:00 PM AST Wed Aug 27 the center of Fernand was located near 40.0, -45.5 with movement ENE at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FERNAND LIKELY TO BECOME A POST-TROPICAL CYCLONE TOMORROW... As of 11:00 PM AST Wed Aug 27 the center of Fernand was located near 40.0, -45.5 with movement ENE at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Fernand (AT1/AL062025)
